items.title: Eat that Frog with a Pomodoro
items.author: MUHAMAMD UMAIR MUBASHER
items.description:
Pomodoro is very famous and productive technique of time management or doing things at right time, that help us to stay focus on task and avoid distractions. Though this technique, we choose our task and set 25–30 minutes on timer and fully focused on task up till time ends. After 25 minutes, we take 3–5 minutes break to take some rest or give reward ourself and repeat this cycle untill work is done.

My Task:

My task was to complete my Coding Challenge assignment that I was struggling to complete it before deadline. So, I decided to apply POMODORO technique. I opened up timer app and set 25 minute on it and just start focused on coding problem that I was facing. After 25 minute, I take a rest for a while i.e., drinking water & enjoying lays etc. And again set timer of 25 minutes, so doing this one more time, I cracked the challenge and done assignment before time.

Distractions:

During task, I faced distraction by mobile phone like social media notifications and door bells, but instead of diverting focus from task, I keep away phone myself.

Experience:

Though this technique, my experience about the activity is great. Instead of being late & stressed out, it helps me to stay focused on task and motivates me and keep away from distraction that usually waste time.

Findings:
I always preferred Pomodoro technique and want to use it again & again in future to done with multiple task. Most Importantly, it really help me to avoid interruption and stay focused on task. In Short, I find it is best solution to complete task on time & getting things done quickly.
